_sText:
zm_pripyat is the first CS:S map based on the abandoned city of Pripyat, Ukraine, which was completely evacuated after the Chernobyl NPP accident in 1986.
This map took around 2 months to make.
Using real footage and artwork, I modelled this map to resemble the most to the actual city.
The main purpose of the map is to give the player a constant feeling of loneliness and of being in a long-forgotten place.

While relatively small, it has some of the classic zm style spots.

It features:

- Precise mapping of the abandoned city of Pripyat, using RL footage

- Climbing/Barricade spots

- Up to 64 players

- Pretty optimized to fit low-end machines.

- Radiation dangers, watch your steps!

Have fun in the forgotten streets of Pripyat...
